name: AVContentKeySessionServerPlaybackContextOption
desc: Options for specifying additional information for generating server playback context (SPC).

items.name: static let protocolVersions: AVContentKeySessionServerPlaybackContextOption
items.desc: Specifies the versions of the content protection protocols supported by the application.

items.name: static let serverChallenge: AVContentKeySessionServerPlaybackContextOption
items.desc: Specifies a nonce to include in the secure server playback context (SPC) to prevent replay attacks.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a playback context options structure with the specified raw value.
